<h3 className="c-secondary">Testable Criteria 2.1.0: Restricting of Essential Inputs</h3>
<b>Outcome: AI companies should not be restricting data or resources which are essential to the development of AI models from other competing AI model developers.</b>

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <th style={{padding: "10px"}}>No.</th>

<h3 className="c-secondary">Testable Criteria 2.2.0: Restricting Access of AI Products and Services</h3>
<b>Outcome: AI companies should not be restricting access to its products and services</b>

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr>

      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>2.2.1</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Does the AI company ensure non-discriminatory access to its AI products and services for downstream deployers and consumers?</td>
